item.title: DOGE’s Dodgy Numbers Employ a Tesla Technique
item.description: Safety researchers claim Elon Musk’s auto company has a long history of potentially misleading stats. Now it looks like his government department is f...

item.title: OpenAI’s Deep Research Agent Is Coming for White-Collar Work
item.description: The research-focused agent shows how a new generation of more capable AI models could automate some office tasks.

item.title: Nvidia Bets Big on Synthetic Data
item.description: Nvidia has acquired synthetic data startup Gretel to bolster the AI training data used by the chip maker's customers and developers.

item.title: 23 Best Vinyl Accessories (2025): Cleaning Gear, Mats, Displays, and More
item.description: From record cleaners to mats, these extras are for budding enthusiasts and die-hard collectors alike.

item.title: After 9 Months in Space, Stranded NASA Astronauts Return Home
item.description: Because of faults with Boeing’s Starliner, Suni Williams and Butch Wilmore had to wait months for a ride back to Earth on a different spacecraft.
